评论详情: Used for grian cosplay I love it

Bought these for a cosplay and the band was very stretchy and soft. It’s lightweight, strap is easily adjustable, harder plastic than I expected so great! If worn, the eye sight is like a dark pair of shades.
This was a fun Christmas gift for my niece from her old uncle pilot! DocWillis.org

I got these for a costume and was extremely happy with them. I expected to not be able to see through them at all but it's like looking through a kaleidoscope! It's a pretty cool effect though I wouldn't recommend walking or especially driving with them on!
Ordered these for a minion costume. The black lenses came out and it was perfect for what I needed! They were comfortable and not tight on my head at all.

Bought these for my daughter's minion costume. She liked the shape of these better than others. The tinted lenses were a little dark for her to actually use at night but still looked cute on her forehead.
A perfect start for a steampunk character, unfortunately when I received these, they weren't mirrored like here in the picture. Sad😞.
